content: free version of the pattern here https //www sweetsofties com/2024/01/pocket-penguin html crochet kit here https //yarnsea com/en/project/2128/pocket-penguin pocket penguin is a quick easy and no-sew baby penguin with a scarf and bonnet hat this amigurumi features realistic color changes on the head as well as crochet methods to make the beak and 3-toed feet this fluffy antarctic bird is able to stand up on its own and makes a great keychain it can also be crocheted with different yarn weights and fibers to create different looks such as super bulky blanket or chenille yarn for a plush velvety look it s the perfect birthday gift or christmas holiday gift for animal lovers and penguin enthusiasts it s also suitable as a portable pocket pal toy for kids to carry along with them as a therapy aid or fidget since this crochet pattern doesn t require sewing and works up quickly it s also suitable as a market prep item especially for the winter season the pdf pattern includes 40+ in-line photo references as part of a detailed photo tutorial to help guide you through the doll-making process *note the initial inspiration for this amigurumi penguin is from pingu s little sister
